lexington.neighborhoods: Downtown, Chevy Chase, Hamburg, Fayette Mall area, Southland, New Circle
lexington.meetingHighlights: Horse Capital recovery with meetings across the city; strong presence near University of Kentucky; vibrant young people's meetings.
lexington.transitInfo: Lextran bus service; Blue Grass Airport (LEX); central Kentucky location.

louisville.neighborhoods: Downtown, The Highlands, Old Louisville, Butchertown, NuLu, Clifton
louisville.meetingHighlights: Major recovery community with meetings throughout metro area; strong Highlands presence; Derby City traditions.
louisville.transitInfo: TARC bus system; Louisville Muhammad Ali International Airport (SDF); Ohio River location.

bowling-green.areaDescription: Bowling Green area, South Central Kentucky
bowling-green.neighborhoods: Downtown, Western Kentucky University area, Greenwood Mall, Scottsville Road
bowling-green.meetingHighlights: College-town recovery with WKU student meetings; diverse schedule throughout the week; welcoming community.
bowling-green.transitInfo: BG Transit bus service; Bowling Green-Warren County Regional Airport (BWG); I-65 corridor.

owensboro.neighborhoods: Downtown Owensboro, East End, West End, Fairview
owensboro.meetingHighlights: River city recovery with active downtown meetings; strong service tradition; regional hub for Western Kentucky.
owensboro.transitInfo: Green River Transit bus service; Owensboro-Daviess County Regional Airport (OWB); Ohio River location.
